meanings.definition: An instrument that measures and records the motion of the ground, especially during earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use seismometers to track movements in the earth's crust.
meanings.sent2: The seismometers detected the tremors from the earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The seismometers at the party were so sensitive, they picked up every footstep on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The seismometers acted like silent guardians, capturing the earth's whispers.
meanings.sent5: The seismometers hummed softly, translating the earth's secrets into data.
